name: Match 3
shortDescription: A colorful, farm-themed match-3 puzzle game where players tap groups of matching cubes to complete level goals within limited moves.
fullDescription:
Match 3 is a vibrant and casual match-3 puzzle game inspired by popular cube-blasting mechanics. Set in a cheerful farm environment, players tap clusters of three or more identical cubes to blast them from the board and progress through levels.

Each level has specific objectives (e.g., clear a certain number of red and green cubes) that must be completed within a limited number of moves. Strategic thinking and timing are key to mastering each stage.

Key Features:

  • Engaging Match-3 Gameplay: Tap clusters of three or more cubes to clear them and trigger chain reactions.
  • Level Objectives: Complete unique goals in each level using limited moves.
  • Exciting Power-Ups: Use boosters like Cannon, Firework, and Rocket to blast more cubes and create combos.
  • Progress Tracking: Earn stars based on your performance and aim for high scores.
